title: Kraftwerk's Electronic Classic Pocket Calculator Remastered 2009
summary: Kraftwerk's synthesizer pop song about operating a pocket calculator from their 1981 album Computer World
content:
• Originally released in 1981 on Computer World album
• Features repetitive lyrics about mathematical operations
• Remastered version released in 2009
• Known for minimalist electronic composition
• Signature song showcasing man-machine relationship theme
